origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SportsFinanceAPI.analyze_funding', 'description': 'This function analyzes the funding trends in the sports industry based on the sector, year, and region.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector of the sports industry, e.g., professional, amateur, youth.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which funding data is requested.'}, {'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The geographical region for the funding analysis, e.g., global, continental, national.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'fundingTrends', 'description': 'A detailed analysis of funding trends in the specified sector of the sports industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SportsFinanceAPI.analyze_funding, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'professional', 'year'是'2022', 'region'是'global'.

prediction:
想法：获取体育产业的融资趋势分析报告。
动作：调用 SportsFinanceAPI.analyze_funding。
动作参数：{'sector': 'professional', 'year': '2022', 'region': 'global'}。
